#summary How to build jSCEP
#labels Phase-Implementation

jSCEP uses [http://maven.apache.org/ Apache Maven] to manage its build process.  There is nothing special in the build process, and the project only uses the default Maven targets.

= Download the Source =

{{{
svn checkout http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ jscep-read-only
cd jscep-read-only
}}}

= Build Package =

{{{
# Install dependencies
mvn clean install
# Create the various packages
mvn package
}}}
